item.title: Gsoc 2017
item.description: This is a summary of the work done during this summer as part of Google Summer of Code 2017 under the organisation Open Genome Informatics under the guidance of my mentors Yannick Wurm and Anurag Priyam.

item.title: Gsoc 2016
